column1: '''Araman''' was the northern coastland of [[Aman]], north of [[Valinor]], that lay outside the mountain-fence of the [[Pelóri]]. It was deserted, mountainous and frozen because of its neighbouring with [[Helcaraxë]] which joined it with [[Beleriand]].

Upon hearing the prophecy the host divided, with the followers of [[Fëanor]] pressing onward while those of [[Finarfin]] turned back.
